verses.verse: <S%H2454>Wisdom<s%> has <S%H1129>built<s%> her <S%H1004>house<s%>, she has cut <S%H2672>out<s%> her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%>:
She has <S%H2873>killed<s%> her <S%H2874>animals<s%>; she has <S%H4537>mingled<s%> her <S%H3196>wine<s%>; she has also <S%H6186>furnished<s%> her <S%H7979>table<s%>.
She has sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> her <S%H5291>maidens<s%>: she <S%H7121>cries<s%> <S%H1610>upon<s%> the highest <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7176>city<s%>,
Whoever is <S%H6612>simple<s%>, let him turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H2638>here<s%>: as for him that wants <S%H3820>understanding<s%>, she says to <S%H559>him<s%>,
<S%H3212>Come<s%>, <S%H3898>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which I have <S%H4537>mingled<s%>.
<S%H5800>Forsake<s%> the <S%H6612>foolish<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>; and <S%H833>go<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
He that <S%H3256>reproves<s%> a <S%H3887>scorner<s%> <S%H3947>gets<s%> to himself <S%H7036>shame<s%>: and he that <S%H3198>rebukes<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man gets himself a <S%H3971>blot<s%>.
<S%H3198>Reprove<s%> not a <S%H3887>scorner<s%>, lest he <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H3198>you<s%>: rebuke a wise <S%H2450>man<s%>, and he will love <S%H157>you<s%>.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> instruction to a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2449>man<s%>, and he will be yet wiser: <S%H3045>teach<s%> a <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H3254>man<s%>, and he will increase in <S%H3948>learning<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>: and the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%> is <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
For by me your <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%> shall be <S%H3254>increased<s%>.
If you be <S%H2449>wise<s%>, you shall be <S%H2449>wise<s%> for <S%H3887>yourself<s%>: but if you scorn, you alone shall carry <S%H5375>it<s%>.
For she <S%H3427>sits<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1004>house<s%>, on a <S%H3678>seat<s%> in the high <S%H4791>places<s%> of the <S%H7176>city<s%>,
Whoever is <S%H6612>simple<s%>, let him turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H2638>here<s%>: and as for him that wants <S%H3820>understanding<s%>, she says to <S%H559>him<s%>,
But he <S%H3045>knows<s%> not that the <S%H7496>dead<s%> are <S%H7121>there<s%>; and that her guests are in the <S%H6012>depths<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%>.
